Title: Silence of the Lambs
Description: A young FBI cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer.

Genre.Name: Thriller
Genre.Description: The Thriller is a very broad genre unified by the intent to evoke excitement and suspense in the audience.

Director.Name: Jonathan Demme
Director.Bio: Robert Jonathan Demme was an American director, producer, and screenwriter.

Title: Lock, Stock, and Two Smoking Barrels
Description: Four close friends attempts to pay off their debt don't go entirely according to plan.

Genre.Name: Dark Comedy
Genre.Description: Dark comedies focus on humor but with a different tone from standard comedies. Usually involving morbid humor or taboo subjects.

Director.Name: Guy Ritchie
Director.Bio: Guy Stuart Ritchie is an English film director, producer, screenwriter and businessman, known best for his British crime/gangster films.

Title: WALL-E
Description: A robot pursues his task of cleaning up a broken earth, until it receives an unexpected visit.

Genre.Name: Animated
Genre.Description: Animation is a broad field involving the manipulation of images, traditionally by hand and in modern times with computers, to create a stylised impression of reality.

Director.Name: Andrew Stanton
Director.Bio: Andrew Ayers Stanton is an American filmmaker and voice actor based at Pixar since 1990.

Title: The Raid
Description: An elite squad is tasked to infiltrate a high rise building run by a ruthless drug lord in the slums of Jakarta.

Genre.Name: Action
Genre.Description: Action films focus on putting characters into situations involving violence and impressive physicals feats.

Director.Name: Gareth Evans
Director.Bio: Gareth Huw Evans is a Welsh film director, screenwriter, editor, and action choreographer. He is best known for his Indonesian martial arts films.

Title: The Grand Budapest Hotel
Description: The story follows a concierge and his apprentice against a backdrop of political instability, art theft, and the battle for a family fortune.

Genre.Name: Thriller
Genre.Description: The Thriller is a very broad genre unified by the intent to evoke excitement and suspense in the audience.

Director.Name: Wes Anderson
Director.Bio: Wesley Wales Anderson is an American filmmaker. His films are known for their eccentricity and unique visual and narrative styles.

Title: Pulp Fiction
Description: A series of incidents and coincidences tie together the tales of a disparate cast of Los Angeles mobsters and small time criminals.

Genre.Name: Dark Comedy
Genre.Description: Dark comedies focus on humor but with a different tone from standard comedies. Usually involving morbid humor or taboo subjects.

Director.Name: Quentin Tarantino
Director.Bio: Quentin Jerome Tarantino is an American filmmaker and actor. His films are characterized by frequent pop-culture and film history refereces, nonlinear storylines, dark humor, stylized violence, extended dialogue, pervasive use of profanity, cameos and ensemble casts.

Title: The Hateful Eight
Description: Lies and intrigue abound as eight colorful characters seek shelter from a blizzard at a stagecoach stopover in the mountains.

Genre.Name: Thriller
Genre.Description: The Thriller is a very broad genre unified by the intent to evoke excitement and suspense in the audience.

Director.Name: Quentin Tarantino
Director.Bio: Quentin Jerome Tarantino is an American filmmaker and actor. His films are characterized by frequent pop-culture and film history refereces, nonlinear storylines, dark humor, stylized violence, extended dialogue, pervasive use of profanity, cameos and ensemble casts.

Title: The Lives of Others
Description: A Stasi officer in East Germany spies on a potential dissident.

Genre.Name: Thriller
Genre.Description: The Thriller is a very broad genre unified by the intent to evoke excitement and suspense in the audience.

Director.Name: Florian Henckel von Donnersmarck
Director.Bio: Florian Henckel von Donnersmarck is a German film director, best known for writing and directing the 2006 Oscar-winning dramatic thriller Das Leben der Anderen.

Title: The Cabin in the Woods
Description: Five college friends take a vacation to a cabin in the woods, where nothing is what it seems.

Genre.Name: Horror
Genre.Description: Horror films engage through fright, discomfort, unsettling imagery, and gore.

Director.Name: Drew Goddard
Director.Bio: Andrew Brion Hogan Goddard is an American screenwriter, director, and producer. He began his career on writing for several popular TV shows before moving to feature films.

Title: Luca
Description: A sea monster and his friends do their best to enjoy their summer at a beautiful seaside town in Italy.

Genre.Name: Animated
Genre.Description: Animation is a broad field involving the manipulation of images, traditionally by hand and in modern times with computers, to create a stylised impression of reality.

Director.Name: Enrico Casarosa
Director.Bio: Enrico Casarosa is an Italian-American storyboard artist, film director, and writer at Pixar.
